content: from * around ending with slip_stitch in third chain of beg chain- 4 round 17 chain 3 double_crochet in each chain-1 space and double_crochet around join with slip_stitch to top of beg chain-3 70 sts round 18 chain 3 double_crochet in each double_crochet around join with slip_stitch to top of beg chain-3 fasten yarn strap lay bag flat mark end stitches you should have 35 stitches between each marker count over fourteen sts from right attach yarn in fifteenth st row 1 chain 1 single_crochet in same st and in next 6 sts chain 3 turn row 2 19 double_crochet in each st across chain 3 turn at end of row 19 do not chain 3 do not fasten yarn attach other end of strap count over fourteen stitches on other side of bag to the corresponding fifteenth stitch with rs of bag and strap facing each other slip_stitch the strap end to bag along 7 sts drop yarn loop and turn bag so loop is on your left trim if using beads add one bead every third st along top of bag only insert hook into loop chain 1 single_crochet in same space and in each st along top of bag to other end of strap single_crochet evenly along side of strap joining with slip_stitch in beg single_crochet fasten yarn attach yarn to corner on other side of strap chain 1 single_crochet in same space and each st along top single_crochet evenly along other side of strap joining with slip_stitch in beg single_crochet fasten yarn © 2007 beverly button http //www buttonspecialties com please do not reproduce sell or distribute this pattern by any means you may sell your finished work made from this pattern
